name: output_image_surrealizer_diffusers
description: Surrealizer via Diffusers — token-level CLIP-L/T5 extrapolation. First 77 tokens: (1-α)*CLIP-L + α*T5. Tokens 78+: pure T5 (semantic anchor). Surreal sweet spot: α=15-35.

prompt.description: Text prompt — encoded separately by CLIP-L (77 tokens, visual) and T5-XXL (512 tokens, linguistic)

alpha_factor.description: Extrapolation factor: 0=pure CLIP-L (normal), 1=pure T5, 15-35=surreal sweet spot (extrapolation past T5), negative=reverse direction. Formula: (1-α)*CLIP-L + α*T5 on first 77 tokens.

meta.notes: Token-level fusion matching the ComfyUI ai4artsed_t5_clip_fusion node. CLIP-L (768d, padded to 4096d) and T5-XXL (4096d) encode independently. First 77 tokens are LERP'd with alpha (enabling extrapolation at α>1). Remaining T5 tokens appended unchanged as semantic anchor. At α=20: embedding = -19*CLIP-L + 20*T5, pushing 19x past T5 into unexplored vector space.
